content:
The Achilles Achilles Battalion Separate Store Brigade named after the Cossim of the Cossack Otaman Ivan Sirko destroyed FPV-Drons five military targets in the Bakhmut direction.

About thisinformsStratum of the Armed Forces, reports the Armyinform.

From enemy iron, affected and destroyed:

  • Tank T-72 (1 OD.)-balanced

    Cost: $ 3 million

  • BMP-2 (1od.)-affected

    Cost: $ 150 thousand

  • BMP-1 (1 unit)-destroyed

    Cost: $ 100 thousand

  • Brem (1 units) - affected
  • BTR-70 (1 of.)-Uralent

Earlier the Armyinformreportedthat when the Achilles BPak works, the occupants' technique is burning.
title: Ukrainian "Achilles" destroyed 5 units of armored vehicles
